name: elastic-dashboard
description: Dashboard for the Elastic BPM implementation

scripts.start:local: set DEBUG=express:* & set REDIS_HOST=localhost& set API_HOST=localhost& set SCALING_HOST=localhost& nodemon app.js
scripts.docker:reload: npm run docker:kill && npm run docker:build && npm run wait && npm run docker:run
scripts.compose:restart: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up
